name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Backend Software Engineer with 10+ years of expertise in building robust and scalable applications using **Go**, **SQL**, **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Kafka**. Skilled in managing asynchronous messaging systems with **NSQ**, **NATS**, and **RabbitMQ**, and proficient in deploying and orchestrating applications with **Kubernetes** and **AWS**. Demonstrated ability to design data pipelines and real-time analytics platforms leveraging technologies such as **ClickHouse** and **Kinesis**.
Strong background in integrating backend systems, with a focus on performance optimization and maintainability, while adhering to industry compliance standards. Brings hands-on experience in developing machine learning pipelines in **MLOps** and handling production workflows. Passionate about driving impactful solutions through technology.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust backend solutions using **Go** and **SQL** for high-performance applications, ensuring optimal scalability and maintainability.
• Designed and maintained database architectures utilizing **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Redis** for efficient data storage and retrieval, handling over **1 million** transactions daily.
• Implemented message queuing systems with **RabbitMQ**, **Kafka**, and **NATS** to support real-time data processing and distributed system communication.
• Deployed microservices in containerized environments using **Kubernetes** to enhance system performance and manageability, ensuring **99.9%** uptime for production applications.
• Integrated cloud services on **AWS** for data storage, processing, and deployment, utilizing services such as **Kinesis** for streaming data and **S3** for file storage.
• Collaborated in developing and optimizing high-throughput data pipelines with **ClickHouse** for analytical queries, achieving latency reduction by **30%**.
• Designed and documented API specifications utilizing **gRPC** for efficient service interactions, resulting in a streamlined development process and reduced integration time by **40%**.
• Conducted performance tuning and optimization of applications, leading to improved response times with a target of under **200ms** for critical endpoints.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to create end-to-end solutions that meet both user requirements and business objectives for diverse application ecosystems.
• Established a code quality framework by integrating automated testing and continuous integration practices, ensuring consistent delivery of high-quality software.

Designed and implemented microservices architectures leveraging **Go**, **Kubernetes**, and **gRPC** to enhance system scalability and resilience in handling high transaction volumes, achieving a **30% improvement** in response time.
Utilized **SQL**, **MySQL**, and **PostgreSQL** for efficient database management, leading to a **25% reduction** in query response times across financial applications.
Extended functionality of existing systems by integrating **Redis** for caching strategies, which improved data access speeds by **40%** and enhanced user experience.

Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure successful integration of new systems, leveraging agile methodologies to deliver projects consistently on time.

Utilized **Go** to develop and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, ensuring high availability and scalability across key modules including checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.

Integrated **Redis** for caching frequently accessed resources, enhancing application responsiveness by reducing read pressure on databases by up to **70%**.
Streamlined message processing using **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, facilitating real-time order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, which improved response times by **50%**.
Implemented automated deployment strategies using **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless updates and rollbacks with zero downtime during platform enhancements.

Managed data streams utilizing **Kinesis** and **gRPC** for efficient inter-service communication and reduced latency in data transactions by **30%**.
Optimized backend architecture for performance and security using best practices, ensuring compliance with industry standards and improving transaction speed by **25%**.
